nycTheatreExcerpt: "Left on Tenth is a slight endeavor  slighter, probably, than a cancer odyssey has any right to be  and certainly falls short of better Ephron Sister efforts. Even so, there can be only one response to it, and that's well wishes for all."

keyPhrases.quote: Left on Tenth is a slight endeavor and certainly falls short of better Ephron Sister efforts.
